Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I was wondering if you guys could recommend me some good stockalike mods, and I mean like stockalike to the degree that they are indistinguishable from the stock parts, a great example would be SuicidalInsanity's mods

The stockalike mods I already have:

Mk2 Expansion

Mk3 Expansion

Stockalike Mining Extension

Stockalike Space Station Parts Redux

Restock+

Near Future Pack

Specifically I am looking for rocketry mods, but all stockalike mods are fine.

 You probably get asked this all the time, but I haven't found any threads that satisfy this question.

Edited October 12, 2020 by Omni122
Clarification as to reason for thread.

On 10/12/2020 at 12:50 PM, Omni122 said:

Hi guys,

I was wondering if you guys could recommend me some good stockalike mods, and I mean like stockalike to the degree that they are indistinguishable from the stock parts, a great example would be SuicidalInsanity's mods

The stockalike mods I already have:

Mk2 Expansion

Mk3 Expansion

Stockalike Mining Extension

Stockalike Space Station Parts Redux

Restock+

Near Future Pack

Specifically I am looking for rocketry mods, but all stockalike mods are fine.

 You probably get asked this all the time, but I haven't found any threads that satisfy this question.

THESE are the mods you are looking for:

If you like SuicidalInsanity's work, you can also check out their Stockish Project Orion.  I also think that Well's work, particularly Luciole, Knes, and X-20-Moroz work really with stockalike parts.  Angel-125's MOLE is worth a look as well for some really nice looking capsules that work well with ReStock and some 1.875m station parts.  However, it does add some custom gameplay elements such as a proprietary science system to the parts in MOLE.
